entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
